settings.style: dark sci-fi realism, high contrast lighting, tension-filled atmosphere

prompts.text: Dark, metallic-organic shapes appear in the sky, casting long shadows and emitting a low vibrating hum. People on the ground look up, frightened and confused.
Inside global command centers and military bases, personnel work frantically. Screens show maps, satellite feeds, and emergency messages in multiple languages.
A hybrid Vak’tar creature, part flesh, part biomechanical, connects its tendrils to a neural interface and begins infiltrating a digital network using psychic energy.
People on crowded city streets clutch their heads and collapse as a massive telepathic wave hits. The air seems to shimmer with invisible pressure.
Over a major city, a translucent geometric energy shield forms. The golden lattice pulses as it protects buildings from an incoming attack. Citizens watch in awe.
Sarah stands in a dark control room, surrounded by a glowing holographic world map. She points to red zones and speaks to distant allies through a headset.
Father Martinez, Daryl, Miriam, and Aida gather with other Anari-linked humans in a secret underground base, planning their coordinated resistance.
In the heart of a city, a massive Vak’tar creature with glowing red veins and spider-like limbs emerges from a dimensional portal. Its eyes flicker with hate.
From orbit, Earth is visible: golden energy networks stretch across continents, but dark, crackling voids spread from Vak’tar impact zones. A battle of light and shadow begins.
